title: L&T bags solar power projects in Middle East
description: L&T's renewable arm won orders for two 3.5 GW Solar PV plants in the Middle East. Projects include grid interconnections with soon-to-start construction, valued at Rs 10,000-15,000 crore. Boosting its green portfolio, L&T is a USD 27 billion multinational. Shares traded at Rs 3,600, down 0.78% on BSE, noted by Chairman S N Subrahmanyan.
